name: Chick Lights Out
description:
Chick Lights Out

Submission to Coding Blocks Jam '23 hosted by Coding Blocks.

Endless 2.5 D side scroller with a dash of Lights Out. 

Stay alive, score high and win.

There are five rules. 

When you flip a rule, one or two other rules are flipped. The rules are also flipped at certain intervals, as well as the way they are wired. The rules can be flipped using the number keys 1 to 5 on the keyboard. 

Rules

  1. W: Jump || Don't jump
  2. .A: Left || Right
    1. D: Right || Left
  3. Shiftt: Sprint || Walk
  4. Egg: Gain life || Lose life
  5. Apple: Gain points || Lose points

Tab: Toggle Menu

HighScore does not work in the browser, it only works in the Windows version.
